name: BREADWINNER: CRUSTICE RISES [CRUSTJAM 2023]
description:
“WE’RE ARE TO NEED YOUR HELP!” - Sentient Stick of Butter

Loosely based on fictional events, BREADWINNER: CRUSTICE RISES depicts the impossible journey of Bread, as they journey downward into the depths of the Zone of Evil— the domain of the evil and wickedly Doctor Pizza.

“ONE OF THE GAMES EVER MADE” - KittyNomad

"OUT OF ALL THE GAMES, THIS IS ONE OF THEM" - Autumn

FREATURES:

  • MULTIPLE ENDING
  • GAMEPLAYS
  • FULL MOTION FMVS
  • UNSKIPPABLE UNITY ENGINE LOGO ON BOOT
  • SIGNIFICANTLY PUNCH
  • AT LEAST ONE SECRETS

Nominated for exactly as many awards as i can count on one hand. I have no hands.

Oh and did I mention it's all FREE!! Because this game refuses to be imprisoned, I've tried and learned the hard way.
